final_value: A Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Satralizumab in Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy (DMD)
start_value: An Open-label Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Satralizumab in Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy

final_value: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy, safety, pharmacokinetics (PK) and pharmacodynamics (PD) of satralizumab, a humanized anti-interleukin-6 receptor (aIL-6R) monoclonal antibody, in ambulatory and non-ambulatory participants with DMD age ≥ 8 to \< 18 years old receiving corticosteroid therapy.
start_value: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy, safety, pharmacokinetics (PK) and pharmacodynamics (PD) of satralizumab, a humanized anti-interleukin-6 receptor (aIL-6R) monoclonal antibody, in ambulatory and non-ambulatory patients with Duchenne muscular dystrophy (DMD) age ≥ 8 to \< 16 years old receiving corticosteroid therapy.

final_value: Group 2: Change From Baseline to Week 52 in Lumbar Spine (LS) Bone Mineral Density (BMD) Z-score Measured by Dual-energy X-ray Absorptiometry (DEXA)
start_value: Change from Baseline to Week 52 in Lumbar Spine (LS) Bone Mineral Density (BMD) Z-Score Measured By Dual-Energy X-ray Absorptiometry (DEXA)
